languages.text: [Угрожающе возвысить голос] "Ты лгал людям, обрек их на смерть, и за это будешь наказан. Я выступлю от лица тех, кого ты погубил".
[Raise your voice menacingly] "You lied to people, condemned them to death, and for that, you will be punished. I will speak on behalf of those you have brought to ruin."
languages.original_text: [Угрожающе возвысить голос] "Ты лгал людям, обрек их на смерть, и за это будешь наказан. Я выступлю от лица тех, кого ты погубил".

traits.locale_text: [Raise your voice menacingly] "You lied to people, condemned them to death, and for that you will be punished. I will speak on behalf of those you have brought to ruin."
[Raise your voice menacingly] "You lied to people, condemned them to death, and for that you will be punished. I will speak on behalf of those you have brought to ruin."
[Raise your voice menacingly] "You lied to people, condemned them to death, and for that, you will be punished. I shall speak on behalf of those you have brought to ruin."
[Raise your voice menacingly] "You lied to people, condemned them to death, and for that, you will be punished. I shall speak on behalf of those you have brought to ruin."

[Raise your voice menacingly] "You lied to people, condemned them to death, and for that, you will be punished. I will speak on behalf of those you have brought to ruin."

languages.text: [Deine Stimme bedrohlich erheben] "Ihr habt andere belogen, sie zum Tode verurteilt, und dafür werdet Ihr bestraft. Ich werde im Namen aller sprechen, die Ihr in den Untergang gestürzt habt."
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice menacingly] "You lied to people, condemned them to death, and for that, you will be punished. I will speak on behalf of those you have brought to ruin."

traits.locale_text: [Deine Stimme bedrohlich erheben] "Ihr habt andere belogen, sie zum Tode verurteilt, und dafür werdet Ihr bestraft. Ich werde im Namen aller sprechen, die Ihr in den Untergang gestürzt habt."

languages.text: [Alzar la voz, amenazante] «Has mentido a la gente para condenarla a una muerte segura, y, por eso, recibirás tu justo castigo. Hablaré en nombre de todos a quienes has llevado a la ruina».
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice menacingly] "You lied to people, condemned them to death, and for that, you will be punished. I will speak on behalf of those you have brought to ruin."

traits.locale_text: [Alzar la voz, amenazante] «Has mentido a la gente para condenarla a una muerte segura, y, por eso, recibirás tu justo castigo. Hablaré en nombre de todos a quienes has llevado a la ruina».

languages.text: [威嚇するように声を上げる]「君は人々に嘘をついて死刑を宣告した。その罰を受けてもらう。君が破滅に追いやった人々の言葉を{mf|俺|私}が代弁する」
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice menacingly] "You lied to people, condemned them to death, and for that, you will be punished. I will speak on behalf of those you have brought to ruin."

traits.locale_text: [威嚇するように声を上げる]「君は人々に嘘をついて死刑を宣告した。その罰を受けてもらう。君が破滅に追いやった人々の言葉を{mf|俺|私}が代弁する」

languages.text: [气势汹汹地提高声音]“你骗了那些人，害死了他们。为此，你必将受到惩罚。我要为死在你手上的那些人讨个说法。”
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice menacingly] "You lied to people, condemned them to death, and for that, you will be punished. I will speak on behalf of those you have brought to ruin."

traits.locale_text: [气势汹汹地提高声音]“你骗了那些人，害死了他们。为此，你必将受到惩罚。我要为死在你手上的那些人讨个说法。”

languages.text: [Élever la voix d'un ton menaçant] « Vous avez menti et condamné à mort ceux qui vous écoutaient. Vous serez châtié pour cela. Je me ferai la voix de ceux que vous avez conduits à leur perte. »
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice menacingly] "You lied to people, condemned them to death, and for that, you will be punished. I will speak on behalf of those you have brought to ruin."

traits.locale_text: [Élever la voix d'un ton menaçant] « Vous avez menti et condamné à mort ceux qui vous écoutaient. Vous serez châtié pour cela. Je me ferai la voix de ceux que vous avez conduits à leur perte. »

languages.text: [Tehditkâr bir şekilde sesini yükselt] "İnsanlara yalan söyledin, onları ölüme mahkûm ettin. Bunların cezasını çekeceksin. Felakete sürüklediklerin adına konuşacağım."
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice menacingly] "You lied to people, condemned them to death, and for that, you will be punished. I will speak on behalf of those you have brought to ruin."
